ygData.subject: RE: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: not true.  I play from 2 different systems and my bank and money stays the same. Bantis ... From:	Trevalien Manix [SMTP:trevalien@hotmail.com] Sent:	Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
not true. I play from 2 different systems and my bank and money stays the same.

Bantis

-----Original Message-----
From: Trevalien Manix [SMTP:trevalien@...]
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 10:28 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?

From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>

I realy hope this is wrong...If a cheat becomes available i will quit EQ. I
can imagine me saving up to get my banded cape (the last peice i need for
full banded i think) and i see a lvl 1 ranger walk past me with Full Thorny
Vine Armor, A Darkwood Bow, Fish Bone Earings, and A Pegasus Cloak. (those
are the items on my wishlist). I would probably chalange him to a dual but
he might kick my ass in that stuff!

Trevalien


>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?
>Date: Fri, 27 Aug 1999 05:27:50 PDT
>
>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>It's been suggested from a knowledgeable hacker, that important information
>(such as your characters banking information) is stored locally on your
>hard
>drive in a packed file. Has anyone else been able to unpack any files to
>verify/refute this? If this is found to be true, then it looks as though EQ
>has been hacked like UO.
>
